item.title: ‘Wednesday’ Season 2 Review: Jenna Ortega Gets Lost Amid Addams Family Mayhem in Overcrowded Netflix Return
item.description: Alfred Gough and Miles Millar have the protagonist solving murders once again, as the two-part sophomore season kicks off.
